fr.lri.swingstates.events

Class VirtualCanvasEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • fr.lri.swingstates.events.VirtualEvent
        • fr.lri.swingstates.events.VirtualCanvasEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VirtualCanvasEvent
extends VirtualEvent
    A virtual event originated on a position in a canvas.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert
